The locating crystal is an unobtainable item that appears during the Shilo Village quest. When the player obtains the Locating crystal, they can use it to locate the tomb of Rashiliyia. A different coloured version of the crystal will appear in the chatbox, depending on how close the player is to the tomb. The actual recoloured crystals, however, cannot be obtained by the player.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
29 March 2004
(update)

The item was permanently added with the launch of RuneScape 2, but remained unobtainable.

17 February 2004
(update)

The item could be seen ingame.

1 December 2003
(update)

The item was added to the RuneScape 2 Beta cache.

The '''locating crystal''' is an unobtainable item that appears during the [[Shilo Village]] quest. When the player obtains the [[Locating crystal]], they can use it to locate the tomb of [[Rashiliyia]]. A different coloured version of the crystal will appear in the chatbox, depending on how close the player is to the tomb. The actual recoloured crystals, however, cannot be obtained by the player.
